title: Chemistry Series A diligence checklist
summary: Projected diligence checklist for Chemistry founders raising a Series A round. Includes a checklist and rationale aligned to investor diligence.

items.item: Current cap table and option pool plan
items.rationale: Investors validate ownership, dilution, and incentives.
Proves commercial momentum and a clear path to revenue.
Shows the path to de-risk the core technical thesis.
Critical for regulated or enterprise-heavy markets.

items.item: Pilot plant scale-up plan and yields (Series A)
items.rationale: Validates the path from lab to production.

items.item: Series A readiness summary for Chemistry
items.rationale: Signals you can close a Series A round in Chemistry.
